phrases: Say, Nana Komatsu.
We used to spend so much time together,
but I did not understand you one bit.
Well, you see... to understand you is usually impossible!
So give me a break, will you?
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
Long time no see.
I wonder what customers we will have today.
Wow!
I have wanted to come here for so long!
Junko's room!
Um, who are you?
Why is a guy with a bigger role here?!
Could it possibly be, you are here because...
- Naoki, is your role in jeopardy?!
- Naoki, is your role in jeopardy?!
Papa-rakkyo!
Oh, do not worry about this.
He is like a zashiki warashi or jizo statue of Junko's room.
Really?
Who are you calling a jizo statue?!
You know, I am being treated terribly lately.
In the last Junko's room, I was here...
- By the way, is not Hachiko here today?
- but did not have a single line.
By Hachiko, do you mean Nana Komatsu?
Yeah.
I hear she is quite something.
She is not only a great strategist, but she is a great cook and great in bed.
In addition, she thinks of Takumi and Takumi only.
- Um... - I wonder about that.
Huh?
Why do not we watch the video?
Hey, Hachi...
That Takumi is so annoying.
Hachi is our pet.
Do not talk of her like she is a dog.
But does not it piss you off?
Get her back, Nobu.
You like Hachi, do not you?
It may have very well happened in the heat of the moment,
but knowing Hachi, she may become more and more serious about him.
But if Takumi continues treating this relationship in that manner,
Hachi is obviously going to get hurt.
Are you okay with that, Nobu?
I do not like it one bit.
If you want her, go for it.
I am sorry about suddenly coming over last night
and blurting out weird nonsense.
So, now that I have come to see you like this again,
this time I am going to be direct with you.
I love you.
I know that I am not being fair by saying this now.
Since I know about you and Takumi.
I am sorry.
You did not come to the studio today
even if you wanted to because of what I said, right?
I am sorry, that is not it!
I was working today!
I do not mind, so please drop by like you have been doing.
Everyone feels a bit lonely without your presence, Hachi.
Actually, it is me who gets sad.
Thank you.
Thank goodness.
That is good enough for me.
Nobu!
Thank you for walking me home.
Huh?
I will be fine on my own from here on.
I am almost home.
I am sorry for having you take a longer route home
in order to walk me home every day.
No, I do not mind it.
Nana!
Well, well.
It is you.
Well, thank you very much for that.
Okay, then.
Thank you, Nobu.
Good night.
I cannot take it anymore.
What is the matter?
Nothing!
It is none of your business!
Um, sorry.
Please leave me alone.
Shin.
A man and a woman are simply opposing creatures
driven toward each other by lust.
Can they be connected by love?
Sorry, I do not know either.
- Yes. - Takumi,.,
I want to see you.
Nana...
- Thank you! - F-For what?
I thought you would never talk to me again.
So I am glad that you came tonight.
What are you talking about?
That is nonsense.
Of course I would talk to you.
I am sorry.
Why are you apologizing?
You have done nothing wrong.
That is not true.
The truth is...
I am a really horrible woman!
What is this about being a horrible woman?
A really horrible woman?
But it is true.
You are idealizing me for sure, Nobu!
Otherwise there is no way you would fall in love with me!
If you knew the real me...
you would be disappointed.
Then, disappoint me.
I want you to.
Because I do not know what else I can do to stop loving you.
I am sorry.
I will break it off with Takumi.
I really did not want anyone to know about what happened with Takumi.
I thought, then I could act like nothing happened
and become your girlfriend.
I had such cunning thoughts.
Lots of them.
Do you hate me now?
Huh?
No.
I am happy.
I cannot take you from him by force.
I cannot have you do something that will make you a horrible woman.
I do not find you cunning.
Do not be so hard on yourself.
It cannot be helped that you are attracted to Takumi.
And no matter how hard I try,
I will probably never be able to compete with him.
That is not true!
I!
But if you tell me that
you are still going to break it off with him and be my woman...
I will do everything I can to make you happy.
For the sake of your happiness, I will do everything within my power.
I mean, with you by my side, I feel like I can do anything.
When you break it off with Takumi... and sort out your feelings...
then come to me.
I will be waiting faithfully.
Sorry, I have to go now.
I will call you when I have some time.
You do not have to!
In fact, do not ever call me again!
Huh?
Goodbye!
Hi there!
Stop startling me!
I told you yesterday.
Put an end to things first, and then come to me.
But I did.
That is why I came.
Too fast!
Nana...
Hmm?
You know, I... Nobu...
I think I am head over heels in love with Nobu.
Is not it natural?
Huh?
Nobu and Takumi?
Um, Nana Osaki and Ren of our band are back together.
She lives with Hachiko, and...
Lately, the relationships are becoming so confusing.
Hey, look here!
It is a diagram of the character relationships in the anime, Nana,
that I made to clarify things.
Wow!
It does not really clarify anything.
Huh?
Naoki's not connected to anyone.
Huh?
Wh-What are you saying!
I am Yasu's best friend!
Even now, he is supposed to be meeting me...
FROM: YASU I HAVE OTHER PLANS STOP CALLING ME OVER AND OVER!
Is he really your best friend?
Sure he is!
Come to think of it, he said this.
MR. Y. T. (AGE 23) OF TOKYO
How are you doing?
I am glad I could finally see you!
Because you were being such a pest.
And there also was this comment.
MR. T. I. (AGE 23) OF TOKYO
Then go home.
Our band can make it without you, Naoki.
Why?!
Why do you two know so much?!
Junko's room is that sorta place.
That is right.
No matter who says what, Yasu and I are best friends!
- I am going to draw one!
- Ahh!
- I am going to draw a line here!
- Do not do it!
Now he is completely isolated.
You are pregnant.
This small black circle you see is the sack that contains your baby.
And the little dot you see inside it is your baby.
Morning sickness?
I will not keep it, so do not worry!
There is no need for you to feel responsible, Takumi.
I am the foolish one.
This child could be my boyfriend's.
Go home.
And do not come back again.
Is your boyfriend Nobu?
Takumi?
What are you doing?
Takumi...
NOBU
Do not tell Nobu!
What is it?
Hey, can you hear me?
Yes.
Nana's pregnant.
I do not know if it is yours or mine, but regardless,
if Nana wants to keep it,
I intend on becoming its guardian and raising it as my own.
What do you think?
Nana...
Is it true that you are pregnant?
Hey...
I want to hear it directly from you.
It could be my child.
There is no need to hide it from me.
And I knew that you had just broken things off with Takumi.
I am sorry.
Why...
are you apologizing?
Did not you break it off with him?!
Please make up an excuse.
I do not care if it is a lie.
I will believe you.
I am sorry!
I want to have this child and raise it as your child, Takumi.
If it is okay with you.
Want To get married?
Huh?
If I marry an ordinary girl, the media will not go too crazy over this.
No?
Married?
So I am sorry, but... could you find a new roommate?
But sure, that is not fair to you having her move out so suddenly,
so I will pay half the rent until you find a new roommate.
I do not need it!
I cannot stand the thought of you doing it with some other man.
Do not you worry about a thing and just focus on pleasing me.
You are a lot more important to me than my boyfriend, Nana.
I think I am head over heels in love with Nobu.
Could you find a new roommate?
If you do not like it, I do not want it either.
I want to use it as a set.
Why do not you use the strawberry glass?
Because there are only two of them.
What if I break one?
But if you do not use them, what is the point of having them?
Yeah, but still, it is too sad if one of a set breaks.
You can use it, but be sure to be careful, okay?
Nana?
Leave her alone.
TO NANA
TO NANA
What is this?
Hachi!
Hachiko, are you here?
I cannot count how many nights
I wished tomorrow would never come
To live as I am without being fake
What do I need
If I do not believe in myself, what can I believe in
The answer is too close to see
Black tears are falling down
I have nothing, only sadness
I cannot put it into words
My whole body starts to ache
I cannot stand it anymore on my own
So there you have it.
Did you enjoy the third installment of Junko's room?
Until we meet again some day.
- Bye-bye. - Huh?
Wait a minute.
Good bye.
I-I-I should have more lines.
Huh?
Huh?
Wait!
